@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Andreas Ecker (ecker) Martin Wittemann (martinwittemann) Jonathan Wei√ü (jonathanrass) Christian Hagendorn (chrisschmidt) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A tab view is a multi page view where only one page is visible at each moment. It is possible to switch the pages using the buttons rendered by each page. Note that prior to v6.0, when changing the currently selected tab via code (ie changing the selection property) TabView would automatically set the focus to that tab; this is undesirable (and inconsistent with other parts of the framework) and is no longer done automatically.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: bar {qx.ui.container.SlideBar} slidebar for all tab buttons

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: pane {qx.ui.container.Stack} stack container to show one tab page
@childControl.description: stack container to show one tab page

@return.name: @return

@return.description: The currently selected page or null if there is none.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the radio group manager.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Map} Maps the bar position to an appearance state

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Apply method for the placeBarOnTop-Property. Passes the desired value to the layout of the tabview so that the layout can handle it. It also sets the states to all buttons so they know the position of the bar.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of currently selected items. Note: The result is only a set of selected items, so the order can differ from the sequence in which the items were added.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Replaces current selection with the given items.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body:
{Error} if one of the items is not a child element and if
    items contains more than one elements.
@throws.description:
if one of the items is not a child element and if
    items contains more than one elements.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clears the whole selection at once.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects whether the given item is currently selected.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if one of the items is not a child element.
@throws.description: if one of the items is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the selection is empty.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns all elements which are selectable.

@param.name: @param

all {Boolean} true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select
@param.description:
true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property barPosition. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #barPosition}.
